name: strapi-next-launchpad-example
description: Next.js Launchpad Example powered by Strapi

scripts.setup:next: cd next && npm install && node --loader ts-node/esm ../scripts/copy-env.mts ./
scripts.setup:strapi: cd strapi && npm install && node --loader ts-node/esm ../scripts/copy-env.mts ./
scripts.setup: npm install && npm run setup:next && npm run setup:strapi
scripts.dev: npx concurrently "cd strapi && npm run develop" "npx wait-on http://localhost:1337 && cd next && npm run dev"
scripts.repo:upstream: git fetch upstream && git merge upstream/main
